title: The Flower
creator_credit: Don Haldane, Canadian Cancer Society and Westminster Films
brief_description: Tells of the historic discovery in 1959 of a drug called VLB (Vincaleukoblastine), which is still one of the most effective means of fighting Hodgkin’s disease, or cancer of the lymph glands.
